extends java.lang.Object

Method Summary
 boolean accept(java.io.File pathname)
          accept returns true for only those File objects that refer to image files supported by the Java Platform (namely, gif and jpg/jpeg).
static java.io.FileFilter getInstance()
          getInstance returns the single instance of the ImageFileFilter object making it accessible to all system objects.
 java.lang.String toString()
          toString returns a String listing all the supported image formats.
